Text:
I came across this book in '96
I wasn't consistent in following its principles and practices, but this book has always helped me out in my tough times(especially the chapters on Yoga Nidra). I have not been more influenced by anything else than by this.
Buy the hard copy (and read it)- you will be making a really good investment........
The techniques stated in this book require no particular belief or faith, only practice
Can u upload the book Ancient Secret of the Fountain of Youth - Book 2 or THE five Tibetans by Christopher S kilham ???
